specialRules.hint: The Grail Relic is a special model that is part of the Pilgrims unit, which counts as having Crew Attacks (A6) and Tough(6). This model and its unit get the Fearless and Furious rules. When combining two units of Pilgrims only deploy one Grail Relic and replace the other with 6 Pilgrims.
specialRules.name: Grail Relic
specialRules.label: Grail Relic
specialRules.description: The Grail Relic is a special model that is part of the Pilgrims unit, which counts as having Crew Attacks (A6) and Tough(6). This model and its unit get the Fearless and Furious rules. When combining two units of Pilgrims only deploy one Grail Relic and replace the other with 6 Pilgrims.

specialRules.hint: This model and its unit get the Regeneration rule.

specialRules.hint: This model gets Impact(+1) when making charges that are over 9” long.

spells.name: Wild Form
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” gets +1 to melee rolls next time it fights.

spells.name: Fireball
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” takes 2 automatic hits with AP(2).

spells.name: Protection
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” gets Regeneration next time it’s wounded.

spells.name: Leech
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” takes 1 hit with AP(4) and Deadly(3).

spells.name: Magic Wind
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” may immediately move by up to 6”.

spells.name: Blood Hex
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 6” takes 1 automatic hit per model.
